document_data.name: Allosaurus
document_data.refs2e: {{cite book/Monstrous Compendium Volume Three Forgotten Realms Appendix (MC3)|18,20}}{{Cite dragon/155/Sage Advice|86}}
document_data.terrain: Any land, forest, hills, plains, marsh
document_data.mainbody: An '''allosaurus''' ({{Pronounce|æl|lo|SAR|us|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|25}}|audio=allosaurus.ogg}}), also known as '''antrodemus''', and referred to as '''flesh lizard''' by the inhabitants of the [[Malatran Plateau]], was a large species of carnivorous [[dinosaur]], part of the carnosaur family, which, in turn, was a part of the larger saurischian family.
document_data.Description: Allosaurs were large, fast and powerful hunters with strong hind-limbs and three-fingered forelimbs. All of the appendages ended in sharp claws. Allosaurs's maws were filled with sharp serrated teeth.{{Cite dragon/55/Dinosaurs: New Theories for Old Monsters|14}}
document_data.Combat: Some of the most vicious hunters amongst dinosaurs, they were known for their great strength and running speed across any, even some of the most difficult terrains. An allosaurus could easily run down prey on open ground. Once it caught a creature it would use its claws to pounce it and pin it down.

Ecology.Habitats:
Allosaurs were commonly found in the jungles of [[Chult]], across the Malatran Plateau of [[Kara-Tur]], and in the [[Stonelands]] of [[Cormyr]].

Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], some could be found in the [[Forbidden Plateau (divine realm)|Forbidden Plateau]].

document_data.Notable Allosaurs:
*[[Bonecruncher]], an ill-tempered racing allosaurus from [[Port Nyanzaru]].
*[[Nasty Boy]], a racing allosaurus from Port Nyanzaru.
